data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - NPC Male Villagers Vol.1
data.detailed_description:
Are you worried that your male NPCs are a bit too quiet? Do you want to add some extra liveliness while your players wander town maps? Then it’s time to give NPC Male Villagers Vol.1 a listen!

12 different types of male voices offer you a wide selection of short Japanese shouts, from cheerful young boys to energetic teens and even serious elders, perfect for giving your male villagers a voice no matter their age! Give your men some audio love with NPC Male Villagers Vol1!

Features:

* 120 different sayings
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
